definition: snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
Daxue or Great Snow, 21st of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st December
Xiaoxue or Lesser Snow, 20th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 22nd November-6th December
to add hail to snow (idiom); one disaster on top of another/to make things worse in a bad situation
to right a wrong/to redress an injustice

sentences.english: I'll get you home tomorrow if I have to shovel the whole road.
sentences.chinese: 明天就算鏟完整條路上的雪，我也一定要把你送到家。

sentences.english: Rain and snow don't penalize your Spot and Search checks.
sentences.chinese: 你的偵察和搜尋檢定不再因雨和雪受到處罰。

sentences.english: The three of them plodded up the hill in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 三個人在雪中一步一彎腰地爬山。

sentences.english: Minshan thousands more hi snow, after the three services do Kai-yan.
sentences.chinese: 更喜岷山千里雪，三軍過後盡開顏。

sentences.english: Images of winter trees have no leaves and white backgrounds because of the snow.
sentences.chinese: 冬天的樹圖沒有葉子，而且因爲雪呈現白色的背景。

sentences.english: Madam Michel found her in an awkward position.
sentences.chinese: 米雪女士發現自己處於一個尷尬的境地。

sentences.english: And somewhere shining snow polished by the wind.
sentences.chinese: 某處被風拋光的雪閃耀着光芒。

sentences.english: Does the rewired ferret come to hear with its eyes?
sentences.chinese: 重新接線的雪貂用它的眼睛來聽聲音嗎？

sentences.english: It’s already snowing in New York! This year it also snowed in October.
sentences.chinese: 在紐約已經下雪了，今年在十月也下過雪。

sentences.english: The snow on the pavement was compacted and has turned to ice.
sentences.chinese: 人行便道上的雪被踩實並結成了冰。

sentences.english: We were amazed. We had never seen flowers in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 我們驚詫不已，從未見過能傲雪綻放的花朵。

sentences.english: She was transitoriness just like snow.
sentences.chinese: 她就像雪一樣，是短暫的。

sentences.english: It is a mountain filled with snow perennially .
sentences.chinese: 它是一座常年披著面紗的山，山上的雪終年不化。

sentences.english: When we go out, snow also seems to be harder.
sentences.chinese: 等我們出門時，雪似乎也越下越大了。

sentences.english: I mean, I did get out for two sessions of skate-skiing this week already, about 30 kilometers each.
sentences.chinese: 這禮拜我確實已經出去滑了兩次雪，每次里程3萬米。

sentences.english: The European eagle owl is close to the snowy owl.
sentences.chinese: 這隻歐洲鷹鴞正在接近那隻雪鴞。

definition: Daxue or Great Snow, 21st of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st December
goose feather snow (idiom)/big heavy snow fall
Xiaoxue or Lesser Snow, 20th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 22nd November-6th December
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine
to float down/to fall gently (snowflakes, leaves etc)
